revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=AP6150DN |revision= |upc= |asin= |newegg= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/14/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=access point |fcc_id=QISAP6050DN6150DN |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8068 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=NAND |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=SPI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GU6KB-15 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, console,, RJ45,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=B50612E;B50612EB1KMLG; |eth_chip3_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip3_model=B50612E;B50612EB1KMLG; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=D0:54:2D |oui_eth=D0:54:2D }} {{TagLine|802.11ac Wireless LAN Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|http://e.huawei.com/en/products/enterprise-networking/wlan/indoor-access-points/ap6050dn-ap6150dn}} *[[Huawei AP6050DN]] / [[Huawei AP6150DN]] - ''802.11ac Wi-Fi AP'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QISAP6050DN6150DN QISAP6050DN6150DN] (2016-12-14) :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8068 &1.4GHz Dual Core :WLAN: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4T4R :LAN: 2x [[Broadcom]] B50612EB1KMLG PHY ===Specifications=== [http://e.huawei.com/en/related-page/products/enterprise-network/wlan/indoor-access-points/ap6050dn-ap6150dn/brochure/wlan-ap6050dn-ap6150dn Specifications on '''Huawei'''] *MIMO: Spatial Streams: 4x4:4 (SU-MIMO), 4x4:3 (MU-MIMO) *AP6050DN: Antenna: Gain: 2.4GHz: 6dBi, 5GHz: 6dBi :Type: 4x Built-in omni-directional dual-band antenna *AP6150DN: Antenna: Gain: 2.4GHz: 3.5dBi, 5GHz: 4dB :Type: 4x External omni-directional dual-band antenna ::The antennas port type is RP-SMA-K. *Power rating: DC 12V/2A or PoE 48V/0.6A (802.3at)
